Name: Midnight Scenes Episode 2 (Special Edition)
About the game: This game is a bite-sized experience (~30 minutes of gameplay). Perfect for your coffee break! Turn off the lights and enter the mysterious world of Midnight Scenes Episode 2 . Explore, solve puzzles, be very afraid. Atmospheric black and white pixel art, inspired on horror and mystery shows from the 60's like The Twilight Zone and The Outer Limits . Eerie soundtrack. Included in this Special Edition: Critically acclaimed short game Midnight Scenes Episode 2 by Octavi Navarro, creator of Pixels Huh and artist on games like Thimbleweed Park and Photographs. Beautiful PDF book of art from the game. Original soundtrack. Game localized to French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese. IMPORTANT NOTE: This game is currently incompatible with MacOS Catalina and later versions. Where to find the PDF Art Book and the Original Soundtrack: To access this content please do the following... Right click the game in your Steam Library and select 'Properties'. Under the 'Local Files' tab, select “Browse Local Files”. Within the game's local files, locate the 'extra_content' folder.
